features: 48 Hour Deep Nourishing: This NIVEA body lotion for dry skin and very dry skin provides 48 hours of deep nourishing moisture
Smoother Skin: Infused with Deep Nourishing Serum and Almond Oil for skin, it reduces roughness after just one application
Tested & Trusted: NIVEA Essentially Enriched lotion is dermatologically tested, and is ideal for those looking for a daily lotion for very dry skin
Convenient Pump Bottle: NIVEA dry skin lotion pump bottle is a convenient option for home or office use
Includes two (2) 16.9 fluid ounce pump bottle of NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion
body.description: With NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion, nourished and deeply moisturized skin is not as far away as you think. This body lotion for dry skin and very dry skin is infused with NIVEA Deep Nourishing Serum and Almond Oil to nourish by locking in deep moisture. NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion reduces the roughness of skin, after just 1 application. With a formula that provides 48 hours of deep nourishing moisture, this dry skin lotion locks in moisture and gives noticeably smoother skin. NIVEA is proud to be one of the leading companies in the field of skin care products, with more than 130 years of experience. Daily body lotion use is a key part of a skincare routine and this product pairs well with NIVEA Body Wash as part of a daily skin care regimen. This body lotion can also be used as a hand lotion or foot lotion. To use, smooth NIVEA Essentially Enriched lotion over body, apply daily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare NIVEA Essentially Enriched Lotions and Creams Body Lotion Pump Bottle Add to Cart Body Lotion 6.8 Oz Bottle See Details Body Lotion 2.5 Oz Bottle See Details Body Cream 13.5 Oz Jar Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 20,056 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,292 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,170 4.6 out of 5 stars 221 Price $6.29$6.29 — — $10.99$10.99 Form Lotion Lotion Lotion Cream Application Body Body Body Body Key Ingredient Almond Oil Almond Oil Almond Oil Almond Oil Skin Type Dry to Very Dry Skin Dry to Very Dry Skin Dry to Very Dry Skin Dry to Very Dry Skin Size 16.9 oz 6.8 oz 2.5 oz 13.5 oz

Does this product come with a pump? We do offer the NIVEA Essentially Enriched Lotion with pump bottles from 16.9 oz. size and larger. The 2.5 oz. size bottle offers a flip cap. Can you use it on your face? We haven't specifically tested the NIVEA Essentially Enriched Lotion for use on the face, but it can be used as a daily hand or foot lotion. The NIVEA Crème in the blue jar may be used on the face as well as body. What ingredients are in this body lotion? You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. Has the formula of this body wash changed? Nivea has been researching the best, safest and most effective skin care formulas for more than 100 years. We regularly analyze our existing formulas and make improvements as needed to ensure all products meet the highest quality standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The lotion is great. A bit greasy at first, but after a few minutes the sheen is gone. I bought a two-pack — two bottles wrapped together with plastic. The bottle necks/collars were busted off and twirling loosely — someone put sticky glue on both to hold the bottles together (even though the plastic wrap served that purpose, so that was odd). I pulled the busted collars off and the pumps work just fine. If you don’t care what the bottle looks like, I recommend purchasing this product through Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cream leaves skin so soft and makes your legs especially look nice..I have been using for years because it it softens and make my skin feel soft and smell nice..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite body lotion
reviews.reviewText: I used to get any random bottle of body lotion from Marshalls or the grocery store. It's fun trying new lotions but every once in a while I'd get one that is waxy or too watery or doesn't do anything to moisturize your skin. This lotion is none of those things. I can truly tell the difference in my skin when using this product- even 8 hours later my skin feels moisturized. This product has a very very light clean smell. This is now my go-to lotion, I keep it in stock all the time. Random side note, the bottle says product made in Spain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very moisturizing and skin softening
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a two pack of NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion for Dry Skin on the recommendation of a YouTube perfume reviewer. She said using this lotion would make fragrances last longer on one’s skin. She was right. It does that and so much more. The skin gets very soft, smooth and glowing with regular use. This lotion is rich AND it gets completely absorbed by the skin. I love it and will purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good lotion, but a little greasy
reviews.reviewText: I like this lotion, it leaves my skin soft, and I love to use it on my legs right before I leave to go out in something that shows my legs. I feel like it adds a little sheen/highlight effect.I’m unsure if the softness effect is temporary and this isn’t the best lotion. It’s definitely a little greasy but I don’t end up like oily all day. It dries. If I lived in a humid climate I don’t think I’d ever use this, though. Otherwise, this was a decent deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After the first application
reviews.reviewText: I normally just put the stars up with no words. I am diabetic with severe dry skin on my feet. I use something that looks like a cheese grater to remove dry skin. After the first time I applied this lotion to my feet, they look great. Very little dry skin left on my feet. It was so bad my heel cracked open a 1in long gash on my heel just 3 days before I received this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cheap and good to use
reviews.reviewText: Very suitable for dry winters, cheap large bowls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts for two days, healed my back.

reviews.reviewText: es la única crema que hidrata mi piel (que es mucho muy seca)

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the bottle had come damaged
reviews.reviewText: One of the two bottles had come damaged. Appreciate if this can be replaced or made eligible for return.
